version_description:
3 - 2 - 1 ... Launch Mode (is here)!
● Added Launch mode with a new style of play.
● 25 more Classic levels.
● 3 new custom balls.

Launch Mode, Update 1 is here!
● +46 new levels for Launch mode, including some truly hard challenges. Good luck and have fun!
● +3 new custom balls.
● A number of bug fixes - thanks for the feedback!

Please let us know what you think at

New Mode: Brick!
● Our #1 requested mode [Brick] is back. Keep those suggestions coming!
● +3 new custom balls.

Another Brick in the Wall
● +30 new levels for Brick mode.
● +3 new custom balls.

New Mode: Rebound!
● Face off against our first AI opponent in this Pong-inspired battle mode.
● +3 new custom balls.

Rebound, Update 1: Time to level up your game; the AI opponent has some new tricks up its sleeve.
● +60 new levels for Rebound.
● +3 new custom balls.
● Fixed a bug that made some obstacles impassable.

New Mode: Star!
● Harder, Better, Faster, Stronger... Starrier!
● +3 new custom balls.
● Secrets.

New Mode: Gravity
● Get ready to get Down ... and Up, and Sideways. Welcome back gravity!
● +3 new custom balls.

We're taking it to 100 with this update!!
● Gravity mode expanded up to level 100
● Brick mode expanded up to level 100
● +3 new custom balls.
● New features available for purchase: Ad-free mode, Unlock all levels and Double-Stars
Fixed some bugs, corrected a few impassable obstacles and added a new music track!

Lots of bug fixes.
Tons of optimizations.
Corrected a few impassable obstacles.

New Mode: Ocean!
● Dive deep into our swimmiest mode yet with all new controls and levels.
● +3 new custom balls.

Behold the Endless Ocean!
● Added endless mode for Ocean.
● +40 levels for Ocean mode.
● +3 new custom balls.

Kick It with our new favorite mode: GOOOOOOAAAL!!
● New Mode: Goal
● +3 new custom balls.

Score again with this update to our new favorite mode: GOOOOOOAAAL!!
● +30 levels for Goal Mode.
● +3 new custom balls.

Score again with this update to our new favorite mode: GOOOOOOAAAL!!
● +30 levels for Goal Mode.
● +3 new custom balls.
● Bug fixes

Two new modes?! Two new modes!
● New (Fan Favorite) Mode: Lava
● New Mode: Fireworks
● +9 new custom balls.

Boom goes the .. Fireworks!
● +40 new levels for Fireworks
● +Endless mode for Lava
● +3 new custom balls.

What is Black & White and Read all over? Color Switch!
● New Mode: Black & White
● +Endless mode for Fireworks
● +3 new custom balls.

Two Colors, Endless Possibilities.
● +60 levels for Black & White
● +Endless mode for Black & White
● +3 new custom balls

Color Switch is lit!
● New Mode: LED
● +3 new custom balls
LED Mode is keeping it lit with 40 new levels, 3 new balls, and LED Endless Mode!

New Mode: Line
● Walk the Line! Another fan favorite mode is back.
● +3 new custom balls

Hurry to finish line mode! New balls, new levels, and new challenges!
● 60 new levels
● +3 new custom balls

Tower mode is back! Can you make it to the top?! New balls and levels!
● 40 new levels
● +3 new custom balls

New secrets await! Seek them in the Tower!
● 60 new levels
● 1 new secret level!
● +3 new custom balls

Get those gears turning! Control mode is back!
● 40 new levels
● +3 new custom balls

Gear up for more Control mode!
● 40 new levels
● Control Endless Mode
● +3 new custom balls

Skip the ads! Buy continues with stars!
Check out the online shop for Color Switch gear!

Get spooky with Halloween mode!
● 60 terrifyingly tricky trials!
● New Endless mode
● +3 new custom balls
Enjoy new Daily Challenges for extra stars!

Drop in for the new ESCAPE mode!
● 60 death defying drops!
● +3 new custom balls

It's finally time to SPIN THAT WHEEL!
● Brand new Prize Wheel with exclusive new balls!
● Escape Endless Mode

Play the season-sational new Autumn mode!
• 60 new seasonal levels
• 3 new balls

Track your Color Switch journey in the new Stats menu!
• Compare and compete with your friends
• Plus Autumn mode endless

Celebrate Switchmas with Ice mode!
• Brand new holiday event begins on December 14th
• Play challenges to win exclusive prizes
• New mode, 60 new levels, and 3 new balls

Chill out all winter with new modes and events!
• New Ice mode endless lets you go for the high score
• Switchmas event continues! Play to unlock exclusive gifts
• Spin and win 3 new Prize balls

Grab some cocoa and celebrate the holidays with Color Switch!
• Get in the spirit with 70 new levels in the festive HOLIDAY mode
• Final days of the Switchmas event, this is your last chance to get exclusive gifts

A new year means new features! Achievements, custom trails, and more!
• Achievements are back! Challenge yourself to earn them all
• Add new trails to any ball
• The holidays keep going with Holiday Endless mode

Return of the Brick mode!
• 60 new Brick 2 levels!
• 3 new balls!
• New exciting Brick powerups!

Mode completion balls are back by popular demand!
• Unlock special balls by playing your favorite modes
• More balls coming soon!

New mode: UP & DOWN!
• Control gravity in this exciting new platformer
• 40 new levels and more coming soon
• 3 new balls, including the boomerang!

Get egg-cited for the new EGG ball!
• Nobody knows what could be inside
• Buy it now for only 1 star
• Watch it hatch in the coming weeks

UP & DOWN Part 2: The Finale!
• 41 new gravity-defying levels
• Up & Down ENDLESS
• 12 new mode progress balls
• Check your eggs! Something is coming...

Get egg-cited for the new EGG ball!
• Nobody knows what could be inside
• Buy it now for only 1 star
• Watch it hatch in the coming weeks

Celebrate the Lunar New Year with 15 days of gifts!
• New prizes every day from Feb 5th through Feb 19th
• Complete Daily Challenges to win big
• 40 new Up & Down levels + Endless

More gifts, more prizes, and colors, oh my!
• Buy new colors from the shop and use them with any mode
• The Lunar New Year event continues with another week of gifts
• Spin to win the perfect Valentine's Day prize balls

What waits beyond the edges of our galaxy? Find out!
* New GALAXY Endless mode
* Fly, shoot, and powerup across the universe
* All new progress balls for tons of modes

Make your way to outerspace and protect Earth!
* 18 new intergalactic INVADER mode levels
* Discover the secret alien spaceship
* Share your Stats and scores on social media with a tap
* New manual cloud saving option gives you more control

The Martian assault continues in an all new update!
* 20 new GALAXY mode levels
* Filled with all new enemies and bosses

Brace yourself for big bonuses that will blow your mind!
* New MARTIAN MAYHEM event!
* Find aliens hiding all throughout Color Switch for huge rewards
* 10 insane new CLASSIC BONUS levels
* Push your skills to the limit

Archeologists have uncovered new areas of the DUNGEON!
* 40 new levels and new rewards await
* Delve deeper than ever before in Dungeon Endless

Beat the heat and visit the snowy slopes of SKI MODE!
* Brand new SKI mode with 24 crazy cool levels
* New mode completion rewards for every mode
* Earn tons of stars by beating all the levels in each difficulty

Put your skills to the test with new DAILY CHALLENGES!
* Play 5 levels each day for big rewards
* Come back for new challenges every day
* More new Daily Challenges coming soon

Fly high and reach for the stars in FREEDOM mode!
• New mode with 60 new levels
• 3 new patriotic balls
• More exciting features coming next week

Put your skills to the test with new DAILY CHALLENGES!
* Play 5 levels each day for big rewards
* Come back for new challenges every day
* More new Daily Challenges coming soon

Put your skills to the test with new DAILY CHALLENGES!
* Play 5 levels each day for big rewards
* Come back for new challenges every day
* More new Daily Challenges coming soon

It's finally happening! What's inside?!
• The egg ball hatches and reveals its secret
• 3 adorable new balls added to the Prize Wheel

Celebrate St. Patrick's Day with the new LUCKY mode!
• A new mode with 40 challenging levels
• Collect 4 clover pieces for big rewards
• 3 new balls guaranteed to bring you luck

It's your LUCKY day...again! New update!
• 40 all new Lucky mode levels
• Even more clovers in Lucky Endless mode
• New Endless Daily Challenge

Dive into the dark with DEEP OCEAN mode!
• Pilot your way through 60 new levels
• Descend into the deep dark of the ocean
• 3 new balls to help you on your journey

A new Event and a new Endless mode!
* Conquer the Fool's Challenge for an exclusive prize
* Limited time special challenge level, this week only
* New DEEP OCEAN Endless mode
* 3 new retro-inspired Prize balls

Hop, skip, and jump for joy in the new RUN MODE!
* RUN MODE arrives with 40 new levels
* Classic platforming action with a twist
* 3 new collectible egg balls

Hop, skip, and jump for joy in the new RUN MODE!
* RUN MODE arrives with 40 new levels
* Classic platforming action with a twist
* 3 new collectible egg balls

The great Easter Egg Hunt is on! Find as many as you can!
* Discover easter egg hidden all throughout Color Switch
* Collect as many as you can for huge rewards
* Run forever in RUN ENDLESS mode

The great Easter Egg Hunt is on! Find as many as you can!
* Discover easter eggs hidden all throughout Color Switch
* Collect as many as you can for huge rewards
* Run forever in RUN ENDLESS mode

Put on your new kicks, there's even more RUN MODE!
* RUN MODE keeps up with 60 new levels
* Fall into the past in a new secret level
* The Easter Egg Hunt event continues for another week!

Light up the night in the new FIREFLY MODE!
* 60 new levels to explore
* 3 new illuminating balls

Bounce through an endless wooded wonderland!
* New FIREFLY Endless mode
* 3 new balls added to the Prize Wheel

Our cutest and spookiest new mode yet!
* Chase and outrun the spirits in GHOST MODE
* 3 new spooky balls

The night is dark and full of PRIZES!
* Limited time bonus prizes on the Prize Wheel
* New DC completion popup keeps you in the game

You asked, we listened! All new user requested features!
* New limited time Star value bonus IAP
* Star purchase confirmation, no more accidental purchases
* Cloud saving has arrived — sync your game across multiple devices

Are you afraid of the dark? Then beware the DUNGEON!
* Collect keys to unlock ancient chests filled with riches
* 40 new deep, dark levels in an all new mode
* 3 new balls to aid your journey

Archeologists have uncovered new areas of the DUNGEON!
* 40 new levels and new rewards await
* Delve deeper than ever before in Dungeon Endless

Archeologists have uncovered new areas of the DUNGEON!
* 40 new levels and new rewards await
* Delve deeper than ever before in Dungeon Endless

Fore! Hit the links and putt to victory in a brand new mode!
* Alll new MINI GOLF mode is a hole-in-one
* 60 brand new levels
* 3 new balls to add to your caddy

Do you have what it takes to be #1? Time to find out!
* LEADERBOARDS are here
* Fight for first with players around the world
* Plus MINI GOLF Endless mode

Do you have what it takes to be #1? Time to find out!
* LEADERBOARDS are here
* Fight for first with players around the world
* Plus MINI GOLF Endless mode

Celebrate independence by winning a huge JACKPOT!
* Spin for a chance to win oodles of stars
* 3 new prize balls
* Use the new social media link to find us on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and YouTube

Beat the heat and visit the snowy slopes of SKI MODE!
* Brand new SKI mode with 24 crazy cool levels
* New mode completion rewards for every mode
* Earn tons of stars by beating all the levels in each difficulty

Can't get enough fresh powder? You're in luck, more SKI MODE!
* 16 new slopes to shred in SKI mode
* Double your Daily Challenge rewards

Can't get enough fresh powder? You're in luck, more SKI MODE!
* 16 new slopes to shred in SKI mode
* Double your Daily Challenge rewards
* Mini Golf Endless Mode fixed

Endless mountains? Limitless slopes? Infinite thrills? Yes, please!
* Become master of the mountain in SKI ENDLESS
* Fight for the top spot on the SKI leaderboards
* New Daily Double Challenge gives you more bang for your buck

Are we alone? No! Aliens have arrived, prepare yourself!
* All new INVADER MODE
* 32 levels of alien encounters
* 3 new unidentified flying balls

Make your way to outerspace and protect Earth!
* 18 new intergalactic INVADER mode levels
* Discover the secret alien spaceship
* Share your Stats and scores on social media with a tap
* New manual cloud saving option gives you more control

Brace yourself for big bonuses that will blow your mind!
* New MARTIAN MAYHEM event!
* Find aliens hiding all throughout Color Switch for huge rewards
* 10 insane new CLASSIC BONUS levels
* Push your skills to the limit

The Milky Way is under attack, and only you can save it!
* Defend the stars in the all-new GALAXY mode
* 20 exciting, flying, shooting, action-packed levels
* New powerups, new bosses, new challenges
* 2 out-of-this-world new balls to collect

The Martian assault continues in an all new update!
* 20 new GALAXY mode levels
* Filled with all new enemies and bosses

The final arm of the Martian army has reached Earth!
* 20 new GALAXY mode levels
* All new enemies, bosses, and the final level

What waits beyond the edges of our galaxy? Find out!
* New GALAXY Endless mode
* Fly, shoot, and powerup across the universe
* All new progress balls for tons of modes
NEW LEVELS! Color Switch Olympics COMING SOON!

- New Music
